summary: REQ-63 (replacing the static resume PDF at the exact public path) is not implemented in the provided diff. The only modified files are a URL parameter utility and project_state metadata, neither of which replace or update the resume PDF asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing static resume PDF at the exact public path "/assets/resume/riya-tyagi-resume.pdf" (file: "frontend/public/assets/resume/riya-tyagi-resume.pdf") with the newly user-attached valid PDF so it opens/downloads without 'invalid PDF' errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no changes to "frontend/public/assets/resume/riya-tyagi-resume.pdf" and no other asset/public-file updates; only TypeScript utility and project state JSON were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified URL parameter and sessionStorage utilities (e.g., persisted URL parameters, hash query parsing, clearing params from hash).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest, which is solely about replacing a corrupted resume PDF at a specific public path without changing the public URL or download logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json summary/state unrelated to resume PDF replacement.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest does not mention updating project metadata/state.
